name: Royal Four
description:
This game was made for TriJam in just 3 hours. The theme for the jam was "Kings and Queens".

  • Music by Mubsi
  • Card Images: Byron Knoll (CC0) https://code.google.com/archive/p/vector-playing-cards/
  • Open Sans font: Steve Matteson (Open Font License) https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Open+Sans
